text: Kase, ki gumon mekunad, ki Alloh taolo u [pajomʙar]-ro dar dunjo va oxirat hargiz jori naxohad kard [va aknun himojati Allohro meʙinad va xasmgin ast], pas, ʙojad resmone ʙa saqf [-i xonaas] ʙijovezad va [xudro dor ʙizanad, to rohi nafas]-ro qat' kunad [va to sarhadi marg pes ravad], on goh ʙingarad, ki ojo [in guna fandu] najrangi u xasmasro az mijon meʙarad
